## pauseUntilDhtEqual variable

A utility function to wait until all players' integrated DhtOps are identical for a given Cell

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pauseUntilDhtEqual: (players: Array<Player>, dnaHash: DnaHash, interval?: number, timeout?: number) => Promise<void>
```
